mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS userId, b.id AS shopId, b.parent_ids AS parentIds, IF((SELECT id FROM trains.report_user_consume WHERE user_id = a.user_id LIMIT 1),1,0) AS isExist FROM mtmydb.mtmy_users a LEFT JOIN trains.sys_office b ON a.office_id = b.id WHERE a.office_id IS NOT NULL AND a.office_id != ''
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO report_user_consume( user_id, shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, arrears_sum )
SELECT b.user_id, #{list.shopId}, #{list.parentIds}, (SELECT YEAR(a.create_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.create_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.create_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.create_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.create_date)) AS 'day', SUM(a.app_arrearage) AS arrearsSum FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_details a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b ON a.goods_mapping_id = b.rec_id WHERE b.is_real != 0 AND b.group_id = 0 AND b.user_id = #{list.userId}
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY a.goods_mapping_id,b.goods_id,b.user_id,year,quarter,month,week,day

INSERT INTO trains.report_beautician_achievement ( beautician_id, shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, achievement, service_charge ) SELECT a.beautician_id AS beauticianId, a.bea_office_id AS beaOfficeId, (SELECT parent_ids FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = a.bea_office_id) AS parentIds, (SELECT YEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.update_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.update_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.update_date)) AS 'day', SUM(a.basis_fee) AS basisFee, SUM(a.post_fee) AS postFee FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order a, mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping b WHERE appt_status IN (1, 2) AND a.goods_mapping_id = b.rec_id AND b.service_times != '999' AND b.is_real = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(a.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY beauticianId,beaOfficeId,year,quarter,month,week,day

INSERT INTO trains.report_beautician_achievement ( beautician_id, shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, achievement, service_charge ) SELECT a.beautician_id AS beauticianId, a.bea_office_id AS beaOfficeId, (SELECT parent_ids FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = a.bea_office_id) AS parentIds, (SELECT YEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.update_date)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.update_date)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.update_date)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.update_date)) AS 'day', SUM(a.basis_fee) AS basisFee, SUM(a.post_fee) AS postFee FROM mtmydb.mtmy_appt_order a WHERE appt_status IN (1, 2) AND a.goods_mapping_id IN ( SELECT rec_id AS mappingId FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping WHERE service_times = 999 AND is_real = 1
AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(reality_add_time,INTERVAL expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(reality_add_time,INTERVAL expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(date_add(reality_add_time,INTERVAL expiring_date MONTH),'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY rec_id ) GROUP BY beauticianId,beaOfficeId,year,quarter,month,week,day

INSERT INTO trains.report_shop_goods ( shop_id, parent_ids, year, quarter, month, week, day, goods_id, goods_sale_num, goods_sale_sum, goods_name, goods_image )
SELECT #{list.shopId}, #{list.parentIds}, (SELECT YEAR(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'year', (SELECT QUARTER(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'quarter', (SELECT MONTH(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'month', (SELECT WEEKOFYEAR(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'week', (SELECT DAY(a.reality_add_time)) AS 'day', a.goods_id AS goodsId, SUM(a.goods_num) AS goodsNum, IF(b.channel_flag != 'bm',SUM(a.goods_price),SUM(a.order_amount)) AS saleSum, a.goods_name AS goodsName, a.original_img AS originalImg FROM mtmydb.mtmy_order_goods_mapping a LEFT JOIN mtmydb.mtmy_orders b ON a.order_id = b.order_id AND b.order_status IN (1, 2, 4) WHERE group_id = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{date},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT(b.pay_time,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(date_sub(SYSDATE(),interval 1 day),'%Y-%m-%d')
AND b.user_id IN ( SELECT user_id FROM mtmydb.mtmy_customer WHERE office_id = #{list.shopId} ) AND a.goods_franchisee_id = (SELECT franchisee_id FROM trains.sys_office WHERE id = #{list.shopId}) AND a.is_real != 0 GROUP BY goodsId,goodsName,originalImg,year,quarter,month,week,day,b.channel_flag
